TEST_NAME: Application Items should be correctly named
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aai.item_name like 'AI%'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aai.workspace,
       aai.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aai.last_updated_by,
       aai.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Application Item `%0` (app %1) should be prefixed with `AI_`', 
        p0 => aai.item_name, 
        p1 => aai.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Application Item `%0` should be prefixed with `AI_` (app %1, item id %2)', 
        p0 => aai.item_name, 
        p1 => aai.application_id,
				p2 => aai.application_item_id) issue_title,
       aai.application_item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aai.item_name
from apex_application_items aai
inner join apex_applications aa on aai.application_id = aa.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aai.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aai.application_id
where aai.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aa.owner not in ('SVT','AST')
EXPLANATION: Application Items should be prefixed with \`AI\_\`

TEST_NAME: Application Processes should be correctly named
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aap.process_name like 'AP%'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Application Process `%0` (app %1) should be prefixed with `AP_`', 
        p0 => aap.process_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Application Process `%0` (app %1) should be prefixed with `AP_`', 
        p0 => aap.process_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id) issue_title,
       aap.application_process_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.process_name
from apex_application_processes aap
inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aa.owner not in ('SVT','AST')
EXPLANATION: Application Processes should be prefixed with \`AP\_\`

TEST_NAME: Region Static IDs should be correctly named
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when lower(aapr.static_id) like 'rgn%'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region static id `%3` (app %1, page %2) should be prefixed with `rgn_`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.static_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region static id `%3` should be prefixed with `rgn_` (app %1, page %2, region name `%0`, region id %4)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.static_id,
				p4 => aapr.region_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aapr.static_id
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_applications aa on aapr.application_id = aa.application_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.static_id is not null
and aa.owner not in ('SVT','AST')
EXPLANATION: Region static ids should be prefixed with \`rgn\_\`
FIX: Correct the region static id name

TEST_NAME: Applications should have the correct error handling function set
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when lower(aa.error_handling_function) = 'aha_apex_global_event.apex_error_handler'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aa.workspace,
       aa.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       aa.created_by,
       aa.created_on,
       aa.last_updated_by,
       aa.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Application `%0` (app %1) has an incorrect error_handler', 
        p0 => aa.application_name, 
        p1 => aa.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Application `%0` (app %1) should have `aha_apex_global_event.apex_error_handler` as its error handler (currently `%2`)', 
        p0 => aa.application_name, 
        p1 => aa.application_id,
        p2 => aa.error_handling_function) issue_title,
       aa.application_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aa.application_name,
       aa.alias,
       aa.availability_status,
       aa.error_handling_function
from apex_applications aa
where aa.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and aa.owner not in ('SVT','AST')
EXPLANATION: ApplicationsÂ  should have \`aha\_apex\_global\_event.apex\_error\_handler\` set as their error handler

QUERY_CLOB:
select a50.pass_yn,
       a50.application_id,
			 null child_code,
       a50.page_id, 
       a50.page_name, 
       a50.component_id, 
			 null parent_component_id,
       a50.item_name, 
       a50.region,
       a50.created_by, 
       a50.created_on, 
       a50.last_updated_by, 
       a50.last_updated_on,
			 a50.workspace,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1, is incorrectly named (id: %0, region: %2)^',
            p0 => a50.component_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.region
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1 is incorrectly named (page %0 app %2)^',
            p0 => a50.page_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title
from (
     select 
     case when pi.item_name like 'P'||pi.page_id||'_%'
          then 'Y'
          else 'N'
          end as pass_yn,
     pi.application_id,
     pi.item_id component_id, 
     pi.item_name, 
     pi.page_id, 
     pi.page_name, 
     pi.region,
     app.created_by created_by, 
     app.created_on created_on, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	   pi.workspace
     from apex_application_page_items pi
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = pi.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = pi.application_id
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on pi.application_id = aa.application_id
                                     and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     where pi.page_id not like '%.%' --indicates a translated app 
) a50
EXPLANATION: Page Items should be prefixed "P" and the \`page id\`, e.g. "P1\_ITEM".

QUERY_CLOB:
select case when aap.page_template in ('Drawer','Wizard Modal Dialog')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       aap.page_template,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format ('Page %0 (app %1) is using the wrong Page Template. Modal Dialogs should use the `Drawer` template',
          p0 => aap.page_id,
          p1 => aap.application_id
       ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format ('Page %0 (app %1) is using the wrong template',
          p0 => aap.page_id,
          p1 => aap.application_id
       ) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.page_mode = 'Modal Dialog'
and aap.application_id = 17000033
